item.title: CVE-2022-40190|2024-09-16T16:58:31.378Z -- sauter%20controls -- moduweb
item.description: SAUTER Controls moduWeb firmware version 2.7.1 is vulnerable to reflective cross-site scripting (XSS). The web application does not adequately sanitize request strings of malicious JavaScript. An attacker utilizing XSS could then execute malicious code in usersâ€™ browsers and steal sensitive information, including user credentials.
